function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Psychological problems such as panic, fear, anxiety, and depression among staff nurses","Impact":"Decreased mental well-being, increased stress levels, decreased job satisfaction","Mitigation":"Mental health support, stress management programs, education on coping strategies","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, virtual counseling platforms","People":"Staff nurses, health care workers (HCW)","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, nursing managers"},{"Description":"Global misinformation and the 'infodemic'","Impact":"Confusion, heightened anxiety, difficulty finding trustworthy information","Mitigation":"Promotion of trustworthy sources, media literacy education, fact-checking initiatives","Technologies":"AI-powered fact-checking tools, information verification platforms, digital media literacy resources","People":"General public, healthcare workers, nursing staff","Owner":"Media organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of preparation to deal with psychological problems","Impact":"Increased tension, decreased staff well-being, reduced effectiveness in managing the pandemic","Mitigation":"Mental health training for nursing managers, preparation for psychological support, development of support systems","Technologies":"Online training modules, virtual workshops, mental health assessment tools","People":"Nursing managers, nursing staff, health care workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, nursing management"}]}
